function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to lack of effective technological measures","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread transmission and higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced disease surveillance and tracking systems, public health education, and adoption of contactless technologies","Technologies":"Advanced disease surveillance systems, AI-powered contact tracing, and remote health monitoring technologies","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government officials, industries","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, technology companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate adoption of remote working and distance learning technologies","Impact":"Increased social contact leading to higher transmission rates, and disruption of work and education","Mitigation":"Promotion of remote working and distance learning platforms, providing necessary infrastructure and support for remote work and education","Technologies":"Remote work platforms, virtual conferencing tools, online learning systems","People":"Workers, students, educational institutions, employers, employees","Owner":"Employers, educational institutions, technology companies"}]}
